data.name: ReadAdministrativeActCertification
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, TAKEN_DT, AAT_TYPE, TANF_CODE from CKT_ADMIN_ACT_CERT where (TANF_CODE = @tanfCode) and (TAKEN_DT = @takenDt) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (TYPE = @type) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: ReadAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE, DESCRIPTION from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION where (TYPE = @type1) and (TYPE = @type2)

data.name: ReadAdministrativeActionObligationAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE, DESCRIPTION, cast(@otyId as smallint), cast(@aatType as char(4)), cast(@obgGeneratedId as smallint), cast(@cspNumber as char(10)), cast(@cpaType as char(1)), cast(@oaaTakenDate as date) from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION where TYPE = @aatType

data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal1
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID, ADMIN_APPEAL_NO, TYPE, REQUEST_DT, RECEIVED_DT, RESPONDENT, APPELLANT_LAST_NM, APPELLANT_FIRST_NM, APPELLANT_MI, APPELLANT_SUFFIX, APPELLANT_REL, ADMIN_APPEAL_DT, ADMIN_ORDER_DT, WITHDRAW_DT, REQ_FURTHER_REV_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CSP_Q_NUMBER, CPA_R_TYPE, CSP_R_NUMBER, AAC_R_TYPE, AAC_R_TAKEN_DATE, AAT_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OAA_TAKEN_DATE, OTY_ID, JUD_REVIEW_IND, REASON, OUTCOME, REVIEW_OUTCOME, WITHDRAW_REASON, REQ_FURTHER_REVIEW, AAC_TANF_CODE from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where ADMIN_APPEAL_ID = @adminAppealId

data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal2
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID, ADMIN_APPEAL_NO, TYPE, REQUEST_DT, RECEIVED_DT, RESPONDENT, APPELLANT_LAST_NM, APPELLANT_FIRST_NM, APPELLANT_MI, APPELLANT_SUFFIX, APPELLANT_REL, ADMIN_APPEAL_DT, ADMIN_ORDER_DT, WITHDRAW_DT, REQ_FURTHER_REV_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CSP_Q_NUMBER, CPA_R_TYPE, CSP_R_NUMBER, AAC_R_TYPE, AAC_R_TAKEN_DATE, AAT_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OAA_TAKEN_DATE, OTY_ID, JUD_REVIEW_IND, REASON, OUTCOME, REVIEW_OUTCOME, WITHDRAW_REASON, REQ_FURTHER_REVIEW, AAC_TANF_CODE from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where ADMIN_APPEAL_ID = @adminAppealId

data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal3
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID, ADMIN_APPEAL_NO, TYPE, REQUEST_DT, RECEIVED_DT, RESPONDENT, APPELLANT_LAST_NM, APPELLANT_FIRST_NM, APPELLANT_MI, APPELLANT_SUFFIX, APPELLANT_REL, ADMIN_APPEAL_DT, ADMIN_ORDER_DT, WITHDRAW_DT, REQ_FURTHER_REV_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CSP_Q_NUMBER, CPA_R_TYPE, CSP_R_NUMBER, AAC_R_TYPE, AAC_R_TAKEN_DATE, AAT_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OAA_TAKEN_DATE, OTY_ID, JUD_REVIEW_IND, REASON, OUTCOME, REVIEW_OUTCOME, WITHDRAW_REASON, REQ_FURTHER_REVIEW, AAC_TANF_CODE from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where CSP_Q_NUMBER = @cspQNumber order by CREATED_TSTAMP desc

data.name: ReadAdministrativeAppeal4
data.value: select top(1) ADMIN_APPEAL_ID, ADMIN_APPEAL_NO, TYPE, REQUEST_DT, RECEIVED_DT, RESPONDENT, APPELLANT_LAST_NM, APPELLANT_FIRST_NM, APPELLANT_MI, APPELLANT_SUFFIX, APPELLANT_REL, ADMIN_APPEAL_DT, ADMIN_ORDER_DT, WITHDRAW_DT, REQ_FURTHER_REV_DT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, CSP_Q_NUMBER, CPA_R_TYPE, CSP_R_NUMBER, AAC_R_TYPE, AAC_R_TAKEN_DATE, AAT_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, OAA_TAKEN_DATE, OTY_ID, JUD_REVIEW_IND, REASON, OUTCOME, REVIEW_OUTCOME, WITHDRAW_REASON, REQ_FURTHER_REVIEW, AAC_TANF_CODE from CKT_ADMIN_APPEAL where ADMIN_APPEAL_NO = @adminAppealNo order by CREATED_TSTAMP desc

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, TYPE, OCCUPATION, AE_CASE_NUMBER, DATE_OF_DEATH, ILLEGAL_ALIEN_IND, CURRENT_SPOUSE_MI, CURR_SPOUSE_1ST_NM, BIRTH_PLACE_STATE, EMERGENCY_PHONE, NAME_MIDDLE, NAME_MAIDEN, HOME_PHONE, OTHER_NUMBER, BIRTH_PLACE_CITY, CURR_MARITAL_STS, CUR_SPOUSE_LAST_NM, RACE, HAIR_COLOR, EYE_COLOR, WEIGHT, HEIGHT_FT, HEIGHT_IN, OTHER_ID_INFO from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb
